Title: Relates to requiring three-point seat safety belts on school buses
Summary: Relates to requiring three-point safety belts on school buses; provides for school districts to authorize such three-point safety belts upon an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Amd ยง383, V & T L; amd ยง3635-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the education law, in relation to requiring three-point seat safety belts on school buses
